data.lyric:
[ti:Walk Me Home]
[ar:P!NK]
[al:Walk Me Home]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Walk Me Home - P!NK (红粉佳人)
[00:03.23]Lyrics by：P!nk/Scott Harris/Nate Ruess
[00:06.46]Composed by：P!nk/Scott Harris/Nate Ruess
[00:09.69]There's something in the way you roll your eyes
[00:14.59]Takes me back to a better time
[00:18.58]When I saw everything is good
[00:22.46]But now you're the only thing that's good
[00:27.49]Trying to stand up on my own two feet
[00:32.15]This conversation ain't coming easily
[00:36.32]And darling I know it's getting late
[00:40.34]So what do you say we leave this place
[00:45.18]Walk me home in the dead of night
[00:50.02]I can't be alone with all that's on my mind mhm
[00:55.31]So say you'll stay with me tonight
[00:59.75]Cause there is so much wrong going on outside
[01:08.96]There's something in the way I wanna cry
[01:13.72]That makes me think we'll make it out alive
[01:17.83]So come on and show me how we're good
[01:21.95]I think that we could do some good mhm
[01:26.94]Walk me home in the dead of night
[01:31.61]I can't be alone with all that's on my mind mhm
[01:37.04]So say you'll stay with me tonight
[01:41.41]'Cause there is so much wrong going on outside
[01:45.96]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[01:50.73]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[01:55.57]Ooh ooh ooh
[01:59.63]Ooh ooh ooh
[02:03.68]Walk me home in the dead of night
[02:07.62]'Cause I can't be alone with all that's on my mind
[02:13.06]Say you'll stay with me tonight
[02:17.49]'Cause there is so much wrong going on
[02:22.02]Walk me home in the dead of night
[02:26.83]I can't be alone with all that's on my mind
[02:32.17]So say you'll stay with me tonight
[02:36.53]'Cause there is so much wrong
[02:39.50]There is so much wrong
[02:42.23]There is so much wrong going on outside
data.trans:
[ti:Walk Me Home]
[ar:P!NK]
[al:Walk Me Home]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.23]//
[00:06.46]//
[00:09.69]你不屑一顾的眼神似乎在说
[00:14.59]带我重温曾经的美好时光吧
[00:18.58]当我亲眼见证一切是这样美好
[00:22.46]而此刻你是唯一的美好
[00:27.49]我努力试着让自己重新振作
[00:32.15]我们的对白似乎有些沉重
[00:36.32]亲爱的 我清楚为时已晚
[00:40.34]那我们离开这地方怎么样
[00:45.18]夜深人静时 送我回家吧
[00:50.02]思绪纷飞 我不愿孤独品尝寂寞滋味
[00:55.31]就说今晚你会陪在我身旁吧
[00:59.75]因为窗外的世界太多是非纷扰
[01:08.96]心底压抑着想哭的冲动
[01:13.72]这让我觉得我们终会全身而退
[01:17.83]来吧 就告诉我在一起我们会有美好
[01:21.95]我想我们可以创造属于我们的美好
[01:26.94]夜深人静时 送我回家吧
[01:31.61]思绪纷飞 我不愿孤独品尝寂寞滋味
[01:37.04]就说今晚你会陪在我身旁吧
[01:41.41]因为窗外的世界太多是非纷扰
[01:45.96]//
[01:50.73]//
[01:55.57]//
[01:59.63]//
[02:03.68]夜深人静时 送我回家吧
[02:07.62]因为我不愿孤独承受隐藏心底的秘密心事
[02:13.06]就说今晚你会陪在我身旁吧
[02:17.49]因为这世界有太多的是是非非
[02:22.02]夜深人静时 送我回家吧
[02:26.83]我不愿孤独承受隐藏心底的秘密心事
[02:32.17]就说今晚你会陪在我身旁吧
[02:36.53]因为这世界有太多的是是非非
[02:39.50]有太多的是是非非
[02:42.23]因为窗外的世界太多是非纷扰
